api_list.name: /price/{assetID}
api_list.description: Get price quotes and details from an specific stock exchange asset
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockexchangeapi.p.rapidapi.com/price/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockexchangeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stockexchangeapi.p.rapidapi.com/price/{assetid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockexchangeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
